meanings.definition: The process by which green plants and some other organisms use sunlight to synthesize foods with the help of chlorophyll.
meanings.sent1: Photosynthesis is how plants make their own food using sunlight and chlorophyll.
meanings.sent2: Green plants rely on photosynthesis to create energy from sunlight and chlorophyll.
meanings.sent3: Without photosynthesis, plants would have to order takeout for their meals!
meanings.sent4: Photosynthesis is like a magical kitchen where plants cook their meals using sunlight as the stove.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of photosynthesis lies in the way plants turn sunlight into nourishment.

meanings.definition: The production of organic compounds from carbon dioxide and water, using light energy captured by chlorophyll.
meanings.sent1: Photosynthesis converts carbon dioxide and water into organic compounds with the help of chlorophyll.
meanings.sent2: Chlorophyll captures light energy to drive photosynthesis and create organic compounds.
meanings.sent3: If photosynthesis were a factory, it would be the most eco-friendly one, turning air and water into products!
meanings.sent4: In nature's workshop, photosynthesis is the master alchemist, transforming simple ingredients into complex compounds.
meanings.sent5: The dance of photosynthesis transforms ordinary elements into the building blocks of life.
